name: Mortalaxy (Kickstarter Demo)
description:
Mortalaxy is a turn based tactical RPG with exploring and crafting mechanics. The game explores physical, mental and social elements of wellbeing and how they interact through its unique story and gameplay. Mortalaxy features a grid based and turn based battle system similar to RPGs like Fire Emblem. Unlike most RPG battle systems, each character can move, attack and use items multiple times each turn, making battles much more dynamic.

This is a demo for Mortalaxy, a game which is still in early stages of development. If you'd like to learn more or support the continued development of Mortalaxy, please check out my KICKSTARTER!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/605345016/mortalaxy

To report bugs or if you want to give any feedback, you can feel free to email me at mortalaxy@gmail.com
